product_name: Horny Toad Dusty Pants - Men's 34" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a relaxed fit through the legs and soft, durable organic-cotton canvas fabric, the Horny Toad Dusty Pants with 34 in. inseam will be your favored alternative to the standard chino. Made of 100% organic cotton with an "ottoman weave" that gives a pronounced horizontal cord and firm character. 2 reinforced front slash pockets abd 2 back patch pockets set onto yoke seam; additional coin pocket wraps over side seam. Closeout.
short_description: With a relaxed fit through the legs and soft, durable organic-cotton canvas fabric, the Horny Toad Dusty Pants with 34 in. inseam will be your favored alternative to the standard chino.
